title: Autofill Rank Draft
body: I am sick and tired of getting auto filled as a support. wtf is the point of draft rank if you can't even get the roles you want to play? is it because there is no one willing to play support and finding a game will literally take like 20 mins? idgaf i would rather wait that long to play the role i want than support and watch my team feed away the game. Please Rito fix this shit.

replies.body: You might not always get one of the roles you chose. At times when the queues are abnormally high we may need to turn on autofill to help get people into matches quicker. Check out [**this article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207267266-New-Champion-Select#h3q6) to read up more on how the new champion select works.

The issue is many would rather wait for 20min than br forced to be autofilled against a one trick.
Just as many would prefer to not have to have an autofilled player vs a one trick as they will likely get shredded.

At least give people the option regardless of how long it may take.

If people are willing to wait that long. Let them. It's our time to utilise, not yours. And I'd rather wait to 20min to have no autofilled players that 3min with any at all.

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BAbNPzFM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-10T01:04:33.680+0000)
>
> At least give people the option regardless of how long it may take.

They tried that last season
Almost no one selected Fill or Support, so the only ones that were still willing to Fill would always be placed in support
That caused people to stop Filling, exacerbating the problem

Giving people the option to opt-out of autofill would hurt everyone's queue times about evenly but hurt those who were still willing to fill's ability to play a variety of roles dramatically more than anyone else.

Hurting the only people being nice the most is stupid.

True, but (cos I wanna keep dis goin)

Yknow what would be even faster?
Reverting the entire system.

As long as you were polite about it, you could usually get w/e position u wanted in old draft even if u were last pick.

Fill players would be in heaven. Queue times would go down dramatically. And all that is needed to get the position u want is a lil manners



There'd be no autofilled dodgers. No autofilled tilt and less disappointments as there's no preference system.
Because you would never pick a position to be autofilled out of to begin with

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BAbNPzFM,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-10T01:26:55.204+0000)
>
> Yknow what would be even faster?
> Reverting the entire system.

That would also be objectively worse 
> As long as you were polite about it, you could usually get w/e position u wanted in old draft even if u were last pick.

You are either intentionally lying, have an incredibly poor memory, or you threatened to int if you didn't get your role which people got away with way more often back then. Champ select before role selector was awful by comparison.

Not lying nor do I have a bad memory.

To quote myself in the past.
"Jungle highly pref".
I said that every single game and I got jungle nearly every time.
The fact that I didn't say "jungle or feed/afk" is likely why i got it so often. I wasn't trying to be a dick nor was I making obscene demands.
Many were more than willing to let me jg
i autolocked Katarina no matter what and things always worked out, have faith in the world and the world would have faith in you my dude

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BAbNPzFM,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-10T01:35:02.486+0000)
>
> Not lying nor do I have a bad memory.
> 
> To quote myself in the past.
> "Jungle highly pref".
> I said that every single game and I got jungle nearly every time.
> The fact that I didn't say "jungle or feed/afk" is likely why i got it so often. I wasn't trying to be a dick nor was I making obscene demands.
> Many were more than willing to let me jg

You got it much more often than you currently do? because looking through your last 40 ranked solo games, you get...
jungle: 22 games
top: 14 games
support: 3 games
mid: 1 game

It looks to me like you're getting one of your top two roles the vast majority of the time (90%) with your favorite role being heavily favored (55%)

I simply don't believe you got one of your top two roles more than 90% of the time before role select. I also don't understand how you're complaining about having to play support for 3 games out of your last 40.

It isn't difficult to cheat the system and not get filled. Someone dodges or a game isn't accepted and I reset the queue.
But I shouldn't have to.

As for how you don't believe it. During my time with draft pick, jungle was the second least contested role (in some cases supp was more contested). And was also the role many were least comfortable with filling if support vs jg were their options.
At that point annie, morgana, fiddle, nid and zyra were pickable hyper carry supports so many didn't really object to it.
As they'd simply "support" if you catch my drift.

As for complaining about playing support. I don't mind support at all. I just prefer to do it from the jungle. Only my support jg champ pool is less than ideal atm due to the current jungle state/overall meta.
If I had to choose a position to never play, it'd be adc followed by mid/sup/top/jg (sup and top r basically equal).


I'm instead voicing for the games in which people r autofilled way out of their comfort zone. If you're autofilled from jg to top/sup there are plenty of champs that have similar styles and spells to help last hit.
But chuck a supp/jg into adc against an adc main and you're in for a world of hurt.

Add to that the cases where players are filled into someone elses pref and vice versa and you have a broken system. (I have indeed had a top filled to adc and an adc filled to top in the same game and on the same team)


When draft was around I could play every role decently. But everyone had to be able to play every role decently, not just me. That was the expectation.
Now you expect to main 2 roles and after a year without 3 other roles I adjusted as such.
It simply isn't time efficient to work at being effective in every position just in case you get auto filled.


If I were to remake the system I'd make it complex with 6 possible preferences one of which being fill. You could opt out of one role only if you chose to fill.
With 4-5 prefences it raises the bar on everyone to play and potentially decreases queue times as there'd be no such thing as auto fill.
If 5 people had supp last pref it would stick someone there based on winrate when placed there (they'd be most comfortable there theoretically)

But autofill was turned on only a couple months into the last season for higher elos, why would you assume that means you would never have to know the other roles again?
> If I were to remake the system I'd make it complex with 6 possible preferences one of which being fill. You could opt out of one role only if you chose to fill.
> With 4-5 prefences it raises the bar on everyone to play and potentially decreases queue times as there'd be no such thing as auto fill.
> If 5 people had supp last pref it would stick someone there based on winrate when placed there (they'd be most comfortable there theoretically)

They tried a 'fill anything but...' function on a server already, everyone opted out of support and it overall hurt the queue. Placing people into roles based on winrate is a really bad idea and creates bizarre ways to game the system (i.e. throwing every time you get support so the game never puts you there) and destroys MMR integrity in a way that hurts people willing to fill as a support the most.

> With 4-5 prefences it raises the bar on everyone to play and potentially decreases queue times as there'd be no such thing as auto fill.
> If 5 people had supp last pref it would stick someone there based on winrate when placed there (they'd be most comfortable there theoretically)

Resulting in support trying to see another lane to be autofilled to support again? :-D
